name: Medical Cost Personal Datasets
data_intro: The dataset is available on GitHub [here](https://github.com/stedy/Machine-Learning-with-R-datasets).

cat_feature_intro.sex: - sex: insurance contractor gender, female, male
cat_feature_intro.region: - region: the beneficiary's residential area in the US, northeast, southeast, southwest, northwest.

num_feature_intro.bmi: - bmi: Body mass index, providing an understanding of body, weights that are relatively high or low relative to height,
num_feature_intro.children: - children: Number of    children covered by health insurance / Number of dependents
num_feature_intro.charges: - charges: Individual medical costs billed by health insurance
